65-3.1: Open all doors %game.mapMarker.1%. Place all characters and character summons, in initiative order, in the closest empty hex on tile 16-A, then remove all doors and tile 13-A from the map.

battleGoals.1301: Have zero cards in your hand each time you rest.
battleGoals.1302: Lose a card to negate suffering 5 or more damage.
battleGoals.1303: Collect fewer loot tokens than any other character.
battleGoals.1304: Kill an enemy attacked by any of your allies earlier in the same round.
battleGoals.1305: Occupy a door hex adjacent to two or more enemies at the end of a round.
battleGoals.1306: Kill an enemy that has two or more negative conditions.
battleGoals.1307: Collect three or more loot tokens in the same turn.
battleGoals.1308: Kill the last enemy to die in the scenario.
battleGoals.1309: Never perform an action with a lost icon.
battleGoals.1310: Never have your hit point value drop below half your maximum hit point value (rounded up).
battleGoals.1311: Kill an enemy with an attack that would have caused at least 4 more points of damage than necessary.
battleGoals.1312: Collect more loot tokens than any other character.
battleGoals.1313: Kill an undamaged enemy with a single attack action.
battleGoals.1314: Kill an enemy with an attack that has disadvantage.
battleGoals.1315: Kill one or more elite enemies, or two or more for four characters.
battleGoals.1316: Suffer damage from an attack in the same round you long rest.
battleGoals.1317: End the scenario with a hit point value of 3 or less.
battleGoals.1318: Kill an enemy and loot the loot token it drops in the same round.
battleGoals.1319: Kill the first enemy to die in the scenario.
battleGoals.1320: Remove a negative condition from yourself or an ally two or more times.
battleGoals.1322: Never collect a loot token from end-of-turn looting.
battleGoals.1323: Never enter a hex occupied by an ally, enemy, objective, or obstacle.
battleGoals.1324: End the scenario with your hit point value equal to your maximum hit point value.
battleGoals.1325: Collect two or more loot tokens by performing a loot ability while adjacent to one or more enemies.
battleGoals.1326: Be targeted by attacks from three or more enemies in the same round.
battleGoals.1327: Never kill an elite enemy, named enemy or boss.
battleGoals.1329: Perform an ability targeting an ally before your first rest and in between each of your rests.
battleGoals.1330: End no more than three of your turns in the hex in which you started the turn, except when long resting.
battleGoals.1331: Perform two actions with lost icons in the same turn.
battleGoals.1332: Never end your turn adjacent to any other character (gain one additional %game.checkmark% for four characters).
battleGoals.1333: Kill an enemy while three or more elements are strong or waning.
battleGoals.1336: Kill an enemy not adjacent to you while you are adjacent to another enemy.
battleGoals.1337: Have on or more cards in your hand each time you rest.
battleGoals.1338: Perform a long rest while at your maximum hit point value, after you have already suffered damage.
battleGoals.1340: Have five or more total cards in your hand and discard pile at the end of the scenario.
battleGoals.1341: Apply a different negative condition to an enemy that already has one or more negative conditions.
battleGoals.1342: Lose a card to negate 2 or less damage from an attack.
battleGoals.1343: Become exhausted before any other character.
battleGoals.1344: Gain 13 or more experience before any bonus scenario experience.
battleGoals.1345: Have three or fewer total cards in your hand and discard pile while also not exhausted at the end of the scenario.
battleGoals.1346: Kill an enemy before it takes its first turn.
battleGoals.1347: Add two cards to your lost pile before your first rest.
battleGoals.1348: Never us your lowest initiative played card as your initiative card.
battleGoals.1349: Never exit a hex adjacent to an enemy except through forced movement.
battleGoals.1350: Kill one or more enemies of each monster type that appears in the scenario.
battleGoals.1351: Gain 7 or fewer experience before any bonus scenario experience.
battleGoals.1352: Never exit a room with loot tokens in it.
battleGoals.1353: Kill an enemy and open a door in the same turn, in either order.
battleGoals.1355: Perform no attack abilities in the first three rounds.
battleGoals.1356: Kill two or more enemies in the same round.
battleGoals.1357: Move no more than two hexes on each turn.
battleGoals.1359: Never attack an enemy that has already acted in the round.
battleGoals.1360: End each of your turns adjacent to a wall, obstacle, or objective.
